tasks.task: Assembling and using a concrete mixer for laying concrete and brick sections.
subtasks: Finding and adjusting the camera settings.
Purchasing and assembling a new concrete mixer.
Mixing sand and cement for a foundation.
Mixing ballast, sand, and cement for pavement concrete.
Laying slabs and pouring concrete to fill gaps.
Considering planting hops on the wall.
Addressing overly bitter New England IPA and arranging a tasting test.
Training apprentice Jack on brewery tasks.
Collecting materials (sand, ballast, cement) from the van.
Positioning the slabs and ensuring proper placement.
Preparing concrete mix (one part cement, one and a half part sand, two parts ballast).
Pouring concrete into gaps between slabs.
Instructing Jack on concreting tasks.
Supervising safety and technique during labor tasks.
Opening and drinking a Northern Monk New World IPA.
Discussing beer's taste and best before date relevance.
